meta.label: Get followers info
meta.description: Fetches information about your Twitter followers. This recipe does not have any input

params.name: dataiku_token
params.label: DSS API Key
params.description: The API key requires global admin rights. It must be a global API key (not a project-specific one)

params.name: connection_name
params.label: Twitter Connection Name
params.description: Name of the Twitter connection defined in DSS

params.name: dataiku_url
params.label: DSS URL
params.description: URL through which DSS is accessible. By default http://host_name:dataiku_port

params.name: default_interval
params.label: Min interval between API calls
params.description: Delay to be added between each Twitter API call
